function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Testing the antiviral efficacy of SurfaceWise 2 in liquid form using ASTM E1052 Standard Test Method.","Impact":"Unreliable test results may lead to the false assumption of effectiveness.","Mitigation":"Ensure rigorous peer review and validation of test results before relying on them for decision-making.","Technologies":"Advanced testing methods and equipment for accurate virus reduction measurements.","People":"Research scientists, healthcare professionals, and decision-makers.","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory bodies, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Using unvalidated research data to guide clinical practice.","Impact":"Inappropriate or ineffective measures implemented based on unreliable information.","Mitigation":"Rely on peer-reviewed and validated research data for clinical decision-making.","Technologies":"Peer review processes, validation studies, and evidence-based guidelines.","People":"Healthcare practitioners, policymakers, and public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory bodies, and public health organizations."}]}
